The larger gage number is actually the smaller needle, get the ones for diabetics I think the come in 20 21 and 22 gage, I got the 20 gage, gave me terrible buises on hip. so I am ordering the smaller gage larger number

go to dreambodyslim.com to get a book by a girl who comes from a family of fat people, it is really heartfelt and good info about getting off the yo yo diet syndrome and getting into a healthy eating pattern where you don't have to worry about food all the time.
